relation: Digital has NOT been confirmed being used at Union Station or around the yard

Control stations for the CORP indicate NXDN capable, but repeaters and portables are not.

The "NXDN Capable" column indicates if the 4k00F1E designator was found in one or more licenses belonging to the railroad, but DOES NOT indicate whether they are using digital or analog.
